text: Misery is a song by American band Maroon 5. It was released on June 22, 2010 by A&M;/Octone Records via the iTunes Store. The song was released in advance of the band's mid-2010 tour, and is the first single from their third studio album, Hands All Over, which was released on September 21, 2010. Genre pop rock Category:2010 songs Category:Maroon 5 songs
title: Misery (Maroon 5 song)
